common.title: Alcohol-Free Week | 7-Day Challenge
common.description: Start a healthy lifestyle with a 7-day alcohol-free challenge. Alcohol-Free Week is an app that supports your journey to sobriety.

hero.title: Why not try going alcohol-free for a week?
hero.description: Deciding to 'never drink alcohol again' is difficult, but don't you think you can manage 'just one week'?

intro.title: About Alcohol-Free Week
intro.description: Alcohol-Free Week is an app for seriously challenging yourself to quit drinking for just one week. Deciding to 'never drink alcohol again' is difficult, but don't you think you can manage 'just one week'? We support you through 7 days of reviewing your daily alcohol intake and resetting your mind and body.

feature1.title: 1-Week Alcohol-Free Program
feature1.description: Having a clear goal makes it easier to stay motivated. Start by achieving your first week. By accumulating small successes, you'll find yourself staying alcohol-free for longer. Your progress is visualized through the habit tracker feature.

feature2.title: Daily Support Articles
feature2.description: Receive one piece of advice per day from 'alcohol-free experts' about changes in your body during abstinence and tips for resisting alcohol. Control your alcohol cravings through knowledge.

feature3.title: Connect with People in Similar Situations
feature3.description: Connect with users who started their alcohol-free journey on the same day, users with similar progress, and experienced users who have maintained long-term sobriety. Realizing that 'you're not alone in this struggle' is the key to success. Share your struggles and successes, and support each other.

recommended.title: Recommended for
items: Those who want to give their liver a break after many drinking parties
Those who can't quit drinking alone
Those who want to quit drinking but lack confidence for long-term abstinence
Those who want to feel daily achievement through habit tracking
Those who want to break free from constantly worrying about alcohol checker numbers

why.title: Why "Alcohol-Free Week"?
why.description: What's important for protecting your health is not temporary restraint, but 'habit transformation.' However, setting big goals from the start makes it easy to give up. This app is not just a recording tool, but a catalyst for changing your relationship with alcohol.

testimonial1.name: 30s Male
testimonial1.title: My habits changed in 7 days
testimonial1.message: I thought 7 days would be impossible at first, but with the app's support and community encouragement, I successfully completed the 7 days. Now I only drink on weekends.

testimonial2.name: 40s Female
testimonial2.title: First step to a healthy lifestyle
testimonial2.message: Alcohol-Free Week made me more conscious of healthy habits. The short 7-day period made it easy to start.

testimonial3.name: 20s Male
testimonial3.title: I can keep going with friends
testimonial3.message: I definitely couldn't have done it alone. The encouragement from the community and progress visualization greatly helped maintain my motivation.

final-cta.title: Start your alcohol-free challenge today to regain your best health!
final-cta.description: Take the first step toward a healthy lifestyle with Alcohol-Free Week.

store-badges.title: App Store
store-badges.description: Rated 4.5+ stars on the App Store.
